oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Strategic irrigation can reduce apple scab (Venturia inaequalis (Cke.)Wint.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Korsgaard, Maren
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Fruit and berries
Crop health, quality, protection
Irrigation and drainage
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Several Danish organic orchards seek methods to prevent scab without spraying. In the years 2011-2013 a new strategy was tested: Irrigation with water at strategic moments to prevent scab infection.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Korsgaard, Maren (2014) Strategic irrigation can reduce apple scab (Venturia inaequalis (Cke.)Wint.). In: Proceedings of the 16th International Conference on Organic Fruit-Growing, pp. 52-58.
